# 2024 California Democratic presidential primary

The 2024 California Democratic presidential primary took place on March 5, 2024, as part of the Democratic Party primaries for the 2024 presidential election. 497 delegates to the Democratic National Convention were allocated to presidential candidates. The contest was held on Super Tuesday alongside primaries in 14 other states and territories. Biden won the primary in a landslide. Marianne Williamson received 4.1 percent of the vote, and Congressman Dean Phillips received 2.8 percent of the vote.
Candidates
The following candidates were certified:
* Joe Biden
* "President" R. Boddie
* Eban Cambridge
* Gabriel Cornejo
* Stephen P Lyons
* Armando "Mando" Perez-Serrato
* Dean Phillips
* Marianne Williamson
Endorsements
(2001–2009)
U.S. Senators
* Alex Padilla, U.S. Senator from California (2021–present), 30th Secretary of State of California (2015–2021)
U.S. Representatives
* Pete Aguilar, U.S. Representative from  (2015–present), Chair of the House Democratic Caucus (2023–present)
* Ami Bera, U.S. Representative from  (2013–present)
* Robert Garcia, U.S. Representative from  (2023–present), 28th Mayor of Long Beach (2014–2022)
* Sara Jacobs, U.S. Representative from  (2021–present)
* Ro Khanna, U.S. Representative from  (2017–present)
* Nancy Pelosi, U.S. Representative from  (1987–present), Speaker of the House (2007–2011, 2019–2023), House Minority Leader (2003–2007, 2011–2019)
Statewide officials
* Gavin Newsom, 40th Governor of California (2019–present), 49th Lieutenant Governor of California (2011–2019), 42nd Mayor of San Francisco (2004–2011)
* Eleni Kounalakis, 50th Lieutenant Governor of California (2019–present), U.S. Ambassador to Hungary (2010–2013)
Mayors
* Karen Bass, 43rd Mayor of Los Angeles (2022–present), U.S. Representative from  (2011–2022)
Individuals
* Jeffrey Katzenberg, CEO of DreamWorks Animation, former CEO of The Walt Disney Company
* Rory Kennedy, documentary filmmaker, daughter of Robert F. Kennedy
* Haim Saban, businessman, media proprietor, and investor
* Tom Steyer, hedge fund manager, liberal activist, philanthropist, candidate for president in 2020
Individuals
* Kii Arens, pop-artist, graphic designer, and director
* Jamie Lee Curtis, actress and producer
* Jimmy Demers, singer
* Frances Fisher, actress
}}
